title: Drag & Drop Template Creator
description: Build sleek, responsive HTML emails using a no-code, drag-and-drop builder. Export reusable, campaign-ready templates with clean formatting.
fullDescription: Build sleek, responsive HTML emails using a no-code, drag-and-drop builder. Export reusable, campaign-ready templates with clean formatting. Ideal for internal and client communications. Features include pre-built components, mobile optimization, A/B testing capabilities, and integration with major email service providers. Advanced template library with customizable blocks, real-time preview, and automated testing across email clients.
